title: personal project reflections for 2025
content:
some neat stuff I worked on this past year!

- improved my flashcards Android app to use a view model to be able to fetch Chinese flashcard data from the internet asynchronously

- improved various demos in threejs-projects

  • new shaders
  • cat demo (and received positive feedback on it :D)

- improved my 3d music visualizer web app

  • can now export recording at different video bitrates
  • added some new visualizers, e.g. orbits, static image

- added some new features to piano_roll_browser, such as a ripples visualizer and a .mmp file generator!

- added new image filters to my imgui_image_editor desktop app

- added a basic shader editor to my artstation desktop app

- various small scripts looking at stuff like LMMS files (in my home repo /misc directory)

- implemented a QR code generator


some future work I'd like to do

- have my flashcards Android app to also fetch Japanese flashcard data asynchronously from an online source

- improve my 3d cat model (featured in my threejs-projects cat demo) + more animations

- make a new 3d demo using speech recognition API

- improve my 3d music visualizer recording functionality to properly capture high resolution (using an offscreen canvas?)

- improve funSketch (clean things up, see if I can delete code, use context for sharing data between components more easily?)

- understand and implement Poisson image editing
